external_references.description: Joey Chen, Cisco Talos. (2025, February 27). Lotus Blossom espionage group targets multiple industries with different versions of Sagerunex and hacking tools. Retrieved March 15, 2025.
Symntec Threat Hunter Team. (2022, November 12). Billbug: State-sponsored Actor Targets Cert Authority, Government Agencies in Multiple Asian Countries. Retrieved March 15, 2025.

objects.description: [Lotus Blossom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0030) is the exclusive user of [Sagerunex](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1210), and has employed variants of this in operations since 2016.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)(Citation: Cisco LotusBlossom 2025)
